training_level.description: The training level of the current block.
training_level.title: Training Level

trials_per_block.description: The number of trials that the current block is expected to have.
trials_per_block.title: Trials Per Block

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the animal poked in the central port (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

timed_value.description: The time it took for the animal to start the trial (s).
timed_value.title: Timed Value

max_duration.description: The maximum allowed time to start the trial (s).
max_duration.title: Max Duration

opto_onset_time.description: Contains the data related to the Optogenetics Onset Time part of the Fixation Time.

sound_onset_time.description: Contains the data related to the Sound Onset Time part of the Fixation Time.

intended_duration.description: The intended duration for the total fixation time (ms).
intended_duration.title: Intended Duration

timed_duration.description: The timed duration for the total fixation time (ms).
timed_duration.title: Timed Duration

total_duration.description: The total fixation time corresponds to the sum of the fixation time with the reaction time (ms).
total_duration.title: Total Duration

base_time.description: The constant part of the fixation time (ms).
base_time.title: Base Time

exp_mean.description: The mean value of the random part of the fixation time (ms), which follows an exponential distribution.
exp_mean.title: Exp Mean

intended_duration.description: The intended duration for this part of the fixation time (ms).
intended_duration.title: Intended Duration

timed_duration.description: The timed duration for this part of the fixation time (ms).
timed_duration.title: Timed Duration

intended_duration.description: The intended duration of the ITI (s).
intended_duration.title: Intended Duration

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the trial started (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

end_time.description: The timestamp at which the trial ended (s).
end_time.title: End Time

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the LNP time started (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the movement time started (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

opto_trial.description: Indicates if optogenetics was used in the current trial.
opto_trial.title: Opto Trial

duration.description: The duration of the optogenetics used during the trial (s).
duration.title: Duration

mode.description: Indicates the optogenetics mode used in the current session.
mode.title: Mode

led0_voltage.description: The voltage to use in the TTL signal.
led0_voltage.title: Led0 Voltage

led0_power.description: The power with which the animal is stimulated.
led0_power.title: Led0 Power

led1_voltage.description: The voltage to use in the TTL signal.
led1_voltage.title: Led1 Voltage

led1_power.description: The power with which the animal is stimulated.
led1_power.title: Led1 Power

response_poke.description: The answer given by the animal in the current trial.
response_poke.title: Response Poke

success.description: Indicates whether the animal answered correctly (1), incorrectly (-1) or whether the trial was aborted (0).
success.title: Success

abort_type.description: Indicates the type of abort that happened in the trial.
abort_type.title: Abort Type

incorrect.description: The penalty time to be applied when the animal answers incorrectly.
incorrect.title: Incorrect

abort.description: The penalty time to be applied when the animal aborts a trial (except if it's a fixation abort).
abort.title: Abort

fixation_abort.description: The penalty time to be applied in case of a fixation abort.
fixation_abort.title: Fixation Abort

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the reaction time started (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

left.description: The amount of reward to be delivered in case the left poke is the correct answer.
left.title: Left

right.description: The amount of reward to be delivered in case the right poke is the correct answer.
right.title: Right

delivered.description: Indicates whether a reward was delivered in the current trial as a result of a correct answer.
delivered.title: Delivered

number.description: The number of the current session.
number.title: Number

type.description: The number of the session type.
type.title: Type

box.description: The ID number of the setup where the animal will performed the trial.
box.title: Box

sound_index.description: The index of the sound that played in the trial.
sound_index.title: Sound Index

left_amp.description: The amplification applied to the left speaker in the trial.
left_amp.title: Left Amp

right_amp.description: The amplification applied to the right speaker in the trial.
right_amp.title: Right Amp

is_short_sound.description: Indicates whether the sound presented in the current trial had a short duration.
is_short_sound.title: Is Short Sound

short_duration.description: The duration of the sound in a short duration trial.
short_duration.title: Short Duration

start_time.description: The timestamp at which the trial started in Harp time (s).
start_time.title: Start Time

tared_start_time.description: The tared timestamp at which the trial started in which t = 0 is the start time of the first trial of the session (s).
tared_start_time.title: Tared Start Time

end_time.description: The timestamp at which the trial ended in Harp time (s).
end_time.title: End Time

duration.description: The trial duration in Harp time (s).
duration.title: Duration

batch.description: The batch to which the current animal belongs to.
batch.title: Batch

experimenter.description: The person who trained the animal in the current session.
experimenter.title: Experimenter

version.description: The version of the project used in the session.
version.title: Version

cnp.description: Contains the data related to the time to CNP.

fixation_time.description: Contains the data related to the fixation time.

reaction_time.description: Contains the data related to the reaction time.

movement_time.description: Contains the data related to the movement time.

lnp_time.description: Contains the data related to the LNP time.

outcome.description: Contains the data related to the trial outcome.

penalty_times.description: Contains the penalty times for different ocasions.

bias.description: Indicates the bias of the animal in the last n trials, where negative bias is a bias towards the left side and positive bias is a bias towards the right side.
bias.title: Bias

reward.description: Contains the reward to be delivered for each side in case they are the correct answer.

repeated_trial.description: Indicates whether the current trial is a repetition of the previous trial (true) or not (false).
repeated_trial.title: Repeated Trial

optogenetics.description: Contains the data related to optogenetics.
